div1.p: P A S S P O R T
This Passport is not in any circumstances available beyond five years from date of its issue. A fresh Passport must then be obtained.
BY HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S CHARGÉ D'AFFAIRES AT BANGKOK.

These are to request and require, in the Name of His Majesty, all those whom it may concern to allow Mathai Kanoo, an Indian British Subject bron in Jenuvain, Azamghar district, India, whose photograph is hereto annexed, to pass freely without let or hindrance, and to afford him every assistance and protection of which he may stand in need when travelling to Manila.

figure.p: Age of Bearer Thirty-five years. Profession of Bearer Sweet-meat seller. Signature of Bearer
